title: 开服报错
author: KillerVcc
txt_content:
服务器突然各个世界挖东西不掉落，丢东西也丢不出去。重启服务器就启动不了了，大佬救命啊

WARNING: coremods are present:

  MicdoodlePlugin ([星系]MicdoodleCore-1.12.2-4.0.2.244.jar)
Contact their authors BEFORE contacting forge

// Who set us up the TNT?
